name: Nyan Cat vs Pongs
description:
Hello! I decided to create a simple game, which gives the player levels that the player doesn't like >:D

Unfinished. There are bugs.

Click anywhere to start sound. Use arrow keys to move and space to bonk.
Try not to get ping-ponged!

Credits: Nyan cat for Nyan cat, Discord for pings, JJD for Nyan cat remix.
